alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 6:42PM MDT until July 09 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WHEATLAND AND NORTH CENTRAL GOLDEN VALLEY COUNTIES... At 641 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 18 miles south of Moore to 7 miles north of Deadmans Basin Reservoir, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail and wind damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Golfball size hail has been reported with this storm from Harlowton to 10 miles northeast of Harlowton. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wheatland and north central Golden Valley Counties. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
